class.name: JarSphericalWorld
class.brief_description: Defines world as a spherical (planet-like) terrain.
class.description: Defines a spherical world, simulating a planet-like environment. This is used in conjunction with [JarVoxelTerrain] to determine whether the terrain is rendered as a flat plane or a sphere. The size of the sphere is controlled by the [code]sphere_radius[/code] property, which sets the distance from the center to the planet's surface (considered the 0-level height).

members.member: Sets the radius of the planet forming the world. This value defines the distance from the center of the sphere to the surface, which is treated as the 0-level elevation in world space.
